entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 12:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
